description: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n >= 2} (n/Product_{i >= 2} K(i)), where K(n) is the Kempner function A002034.
references: I. Cojocaru, S. Cojocaru, The Third and Fourth Constants of Smarandache, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 7, No. 1-2-3, 1996, 121-126.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smarandache Constants
author: Charles T. Le (charlestle(AT)yahoo.com)
extensions: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 18 2006
